p: OV EO emulsion (10% v/v) was prepared by thoroughly triturating ten volumes of the oil with one volume of Tween 20 (10 ml oil + 1 ml Tween 20). The total volume was completed to 100 with distilled water. The resultant emulsion was sterilized by filtration though a 0.45 µm membrane filter (Millipore, USA) and refrigerated in a sealed amber vial till use.
